highly qualified barbers

barbers

/ 01

the team

we all love what we do

Mustache expert

Thomas is the founder and owner of the barbershop.

Beard Trimmer

Edward has been in the barber industry for over 10 years.

Hair Specialist

Roy it's very passionate, and he's been with us since 2010.

BEARD TRIMMER​

Jesse is awesome and he's been with us since 2012.​

hair specialist

Sean has been in the barber industry for over 7 years.
